title: Developing a Love of Prayer in Your Kids, Part 1
itunes:author: John Fuller & Danny Huerta
itunes:summary: Teaching your kids to pray can be a daunting task but it doesn't have to be as scary as you might be thinking. Featuring Dr. David Ireland.
description: Teaching your kids to pray can be a daunting task but it doesn't have to be as scary as you might be thinking. Featuring Dr. David Ireland.
